link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000

Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
mathematica: a[ n_ ] := Mod[ Numerator[ -n* BernoulliB[ n-1 ]]*PowerMod[ Denominator[ n*BernoulliB[ n-1 ] ], -1, n ], n ] (* _Jonathan Sondow_, Aug 13 2013 *)
